data.scheme_name: Generator Set Subsidy Scheme - medium enterprises - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides subsidy up to 25% to purchase generator set for uninterrupted power.
data.eligibility: All existing industrial units anywhere in the state are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The unit should file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal for statistical purposes. 
  2. The unit should not be in the restrictive list as notified by the State government. 
  3. The unit should be in commercial production. 
  4. The unit must be in regular production at the time of disbursement; subsidies won't be released to closed units. 
  5. The G Set should be purchased from an authorized dealer after 01.01.2021 and kept intact and operational for 5 years.
data.beneficiaries: All existing industrial units anywhere in the state are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The unit should file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal for statistical purposes. 
  2. The unit should not be in the restrictive list as notified by the State government. 
  3. The unit should be in commercial production. 
  4. The unit must be in regular production at the time of disbursement; subsidies won't be released to closed units. 
  5. The G Set should be purchased from an authorized dealer after 01.01.2021 and kept intact and operational for 5 years.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: The scheme is introduced to facilitate the Small and Medium Enterprises to purchase the G set at the subsidized cost for uninterrupted power.
data.objective: To facilitate the SMEs to purchase the generator for uninturrupted power supply at subsidised rate in C & D category States.
data.description:
Scheme provides generator subsidy Rs.0.08 per KVA subsidy upto maximum of 25% for uninterrupted power.
Applicable for G set cost in 'D' and 'C' category blocks in rural areas.
data.how_to_apply: Applicant must submit application to the Directorate of MSME, Haryana within 3 months from the purchase of generator.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf 

Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
